articles.title: Allu Arjun And Sneha Reddy's Love Story - BollywoodShaadis.com
articles.description: Allu Arjun And Sneha Reddy's Love Story
articles.content: On April 3, 2014, Allu Arjun and Sneha were blessed with a baby boy, Allu Ayaan. After two years, on November 21, 2016, the couple had welcomed their baby girl, whom they have named Allu Arha.
